text:
I've always wanted to work in the fashion industry. Lately, by chosing my actual studies void, i've been thinking about "Where I can go to achieve my dream job?" Because, as you certainely know, this world is quiet selective so being appart of it it's difficult and ask some relations or luckiness.To me, communication is the "easier" way to enter in fashion and moreover reach my dream job.
But, to be honest, I don't have one single job in my mind. The goal is to work in it but maybe by being multifonctional : working for some fashion magazines, lead a complete editorial, manage the graphism of a brand or even more being in charge of events. I think that the fashion industry is larger than people think and can be very versatile.
To talk more about this passion, from where it cames I wanted to tell you more about my childhood. My big sister was very interested by fashion magazines and always wanted to be a stylist. Growing up next to her, introduce me to this world. Having this relationship with fashion, since I was like 6-7yo, allow me to become the person I am today.
Now that I grow up, fashion take a huge place in my daily life, making me feel more confident. It inspires me so much throught social medias or magazines.
A lot of people think that it's superficial, something that doesn't matter or only for the people who have any struggle or problems in their life. But to me, this is something bigger than that. Everybody must be interested by what they wear. Being concerned by the clothes you put in your skin, can made you feel stronger. I know that if I put something I don't like, I'll pass a bad day. Clothes are like an armor to show the world who you really are and beat the day.
